short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts web pages you are currently looking at into videos. The videos are produced in the mp4 (H264) format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't just capture a snapshot of a webpage record how it changes overtime!

Quickly convert any webpage to a mp4 video file, that can be opened in most web browsers and video players. This application reads the content of the current web page and sends it to GrabzIt's API for conversion before automatically displaying it in your browser window were it can be played and downloaded.

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting!
